problem.question: How do you keep a wood fire burning?
options: Build the logs up in a cavern like way so the oxygen can easily get to the fire.
Build the logs up in a stack like way so the oxygen can easily get to the fire.

key_steps: Fire requires oxygen to burn (fire triangle: fuel, heat, oxygen)
Cavern structure allows air circulation from multiple angles
Stack structure blocks airflow, smothering the fire

logic_requirements: Compares airflow in cavern vs stack structure
